title: Skip Beat!, Vol. 21
description: Reads R to L (Japanese Style). Show biz is sweet, but revenge is sweeter! Kyoko is basking in the glow of working a Christmas miracle and getting some birthday booty of her own. But she's so unused to this kind of joy that she ends up late to the script reading for her new drama. Now her whole day is a mess and Ren is mad at her! Can Kyoko balance revenge, a career and her own happiness?Chapters: 121-126
author: Yoshiki Nakamura
